website_summaries.verdict: If you need a warm winter boot for hunting, this is a great choice.
pros: Similar to the Tibet GTX but designed with winter in mind
Even in subzero temperatures, this boot should keep your feet warm and comfortable
The nine-inch shaft keeps snow and ice out, and the breathable design keeps you from overheating
cons: Sizing runs a bit small, so order accordingly

customer_reviews.title: They offer the same roller blade like support but combined with merino wool socks my feet ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a trip to Alaska in December. Consider them an extreme cold weather version of the combat GTX. They offer the same roller blade like support but combined with merino wool socks my feet never felt like they were outside, even down to -38C. Nor did my feet feel hot when inside. They are expensive, but are not designed for casual outdoorsy activities. If however you're planning on going somewhere where inferior gear may cost you your toes... Get these.
customer_reviews.author: christiaan johnson

customer_reviews.title: The only boot
customer_reviews.text: I have had these in alaska for a winter and summer season. Frankly they are the bong. I have never needed heavy socks in the winter. Nor sweated in the summer. They breath so fantasticly. I have two friends that have older models for about 5 years.... awesome boots no chance I'll risk buying any other brand... love the. Also note the height was off putting at first... but again very well designed to ensure you are save on uneven ground or rushing through a stream. Also cool as hell looking.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!!
customer_reviews.text: These boots I ordered in June were my 3rd pair of Lowa boots. I work outside a lot in all kinds of conditions. My first two pairs of Lowa boots held up very well and lasted about 2 years each. On this pair of boots I just got two months ago, the rubber rand has started to separate from the leather in two places and there are deep cracks in the leather. I contact Lowa for return information and I was told that the warranty is voided because I bought the boots from an “unauthorized dealer”. Buyer Beware! Quality is down and warranty is garbage!!! Never again!
customer_reviews.author: Adriane N. Honerlaw

customer_reviews.title: Only the best boots in the world.
customer_reviews.text: These Lowa boots are awesome. Right out of the box, they are comfortable. When laced up right. They offer so much stability and support. They are more than worth the money. So excited to put them to the test. The only thing I can say is. If you have a wide foot. I would say to order a wide. My foot is regular. And they fit snug. I am a size 11, with a little room in the toe box area. These are true to size. Hopefully my comments help you with your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RIGWISE..

customer_reviews.title: Very glad I bought them
customer_reviews.text: A very well made rugged boot. They breathe. Very glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Fuchs

customer_reviews.title: Order a half size larger.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a size 11; I've read that they run small and to order a half size larger.I wear a size 10.5; they fit perfect. I tried them on when I got home from work; they say your feet are larger in the afternoon then they are in the morning. You can see immediately the high quality material and workmanship in this boot as soon as you open the box and feel and wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Joe B

customer_reviews.title: Lowa is the only brand of boots i will buy!
customer_reviews.text: my third pair of Lowa's. Very happy with fit and quality of them all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Boots but are not true to size
customer_reviews.text: Nice Boots but are not true to size. Shipping was a nightmare. Shipped through DHL and they held 1 of the 3 boxes for payment. Which was already paid.
customer_reviews.author: Patt Yost

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good boots but too large should haw tried them on.
customer_reviews.author: Ola Vassbø

customer_reviews.title: Holds up to AK, WY and time
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the slightly older but nearly identical pair of these boots since about 2010. Had them in Alaska on a couple of mountain goat hunts, a Dahl sheep hunt, a caribou hunt and some moose hunts. Then hunted with them for elk and mule deer in Wyoming. Sadly I was transferred to Oklahoma where a self respecting wildland hunter doesn’t bother to sit in a stand over corn so they went ignored for a couple of years. Here I am back in Wyoming so I pulled them out, put new Obenaufs laces and wax on them and they feel great! When I wear these out I’ll be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wore these boots on a few short trips an they are falling apart. The rubber is separating from the leather in several places. I contacted Lowa sent them pictures and basically got no assistance or feesable help. The warranty is a joke unless you want to either A) go without boots for 6 weeks during hunting season or (b) have wet feet for 6 weeks during season then pay to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. JMFW

customer_reviews.title: The boots disintegrate if you store them.
customer_reviews.text: They use polyurethane that crumbles when stored. Mine fell apart on a hunt leaving me with no shoes. Theyare poor design.From their website: "Sole Units will degrade when your footwear is used only occasionally and is stored for long periods of time. Sole units degrade faster than if the footwear is worn regularly. "
customer_reviews.author: audiophile file

customer_reviews.title: These are Great Mountain Boot
customer_reviews.text: Multiple mountain hunts over 3 years in Alaska. These are Great Mountain Boot.
customer_reviews.author: BOBBY G DAVIS

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Have had them for only 1 week but are very comfortable and construction is solid. So far no sore spots/rubs. Will see how they perform over this hunting season.
customer_reviews.author: PV- Idaho

product_meta.title: Lowa Men's Hunter Goretex EVO Extreme Hiking Boot
product_meta.description: For close to 90 years, LOWA boots have been acclaimed by climbers, mountaineers and hikers as the finest outdoor boots in the world. Every LOWA boot is handcrafted in Europe, where they incorporate the elements of thoughtful design, superb materials, clean manufacturing processes and fair labor standards. When you own a pair of LOWAs, you can be confident that you're wearing authentic outdoor footwear that "walks the talk" when it comes to quality, performance and sustainability.
feature_bullets: Seamless, waterproof GORE-TEX lining with Primaloft insulation
Patent pending tongue stud allows for better pressure distribution
Balance footbed with breathable top layer
